price: 114. Waxay rumeysan yihiin Alle iyo Maalinta Aakhiro; waxayna amraan samaha oo reebaan xumaha19; oo iskula tartamaan u degdegidda camallada khayrka, kuwaa waxay ka mid yihiin kuwa wanaagsan.
arabic: يُؤۡمِنُونَ بِٱللَّهِ وَٱلۡيَوۡمِ ٱلۡأٓخِرِ وَيَأۡمُرُونَ بِٱلۡمَعۡرُوفِ وَيَنۡهَوۡنَ عَنِ ٱلۡمُنكَرِ وَيُسَٰرِعُونَ فِي ٱلۡخَيۡرَٰتِۖ وَأُوْلَٰٓئِكَ مِنَ ٱلصَّٰلِحِينَ
footnotes: 19. Nabigu s.c.w. wuxuu yidhi: Alle baan ku dhaartee wanaaggaad amreysaan oo xumaantaad reebeysaan, ama wuxuu Alle idiin soo diri ciqaab Xaggiisa ah, markaasaad baryeysaan mase idinka aqbalayo baryada.”

version.title: Somali translation - Jacob
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur'an into the Somali language, translated by Abdullah Hasan Jacob.

meta.transliteration: yu'minūna bil-lahi wal-yawmi al-ākhiri wayamurūna bil-maʿrūfi wayanhawna ʿani al-munkari wayusāriʿūna fī al-khayrāti wa-ulāika mina al-ṣāliḥīna
